text: Aap keh dijiye kay aey ehal-e-kitab! Aisi insaf wali baat ki taraf aao jo hum mein tum mein barabar hai kay hum Allah Taalaa kay siwa kissi ki ibadat na keren na uss kay sath kissi ko shareek banayen na Allah Taalaa ko chor ker aapas mein aik doosray ko hi rab banayen. Pus agar woh mun pher len to tum keh do kay gawah raho hum to musalman hain
